testsuite.name: tests.web.TS_Search
testsuite.system-out: INFO: Precondition: Initial Data INFO: 1. Navigate to https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Main_Page. INFO: 2. Enter a valid single-word text in the Search textbox. INFO: 3.
